nodes.text: The Utozz Prime system was located in the Tarabba sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It shared its name with Utozz Prime Brewery, a corporation that manufactured Utozz, a brand of the beverage known as Utoz.
The Utozz Prime system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square M-19.
